text:
Using a URI framgment on the command line does not work anymore.
Example:

build.sh svgrasterizer samples/anne.svg#svgView(viewBox(0,0,100,100))

It used to work and I found that bug when I was 
trying to fix a bug in the PrintTranscoder (taking into account the URI 
fragment while printing).
creator: tkormann@apache.org

text:
There is a regression test for URI fragments in 
org.apache.batik.apps.rasterizer.SVGConverterTest
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
